law.catch_line: Authorized insurer prohibited from doing business in Kentucky with unlicensed adjuster or administrator.

text.section: An authorized insurer shall not do business in Kentucky with an adjuster who is unlicensed in violation of KRS 304.9-080 and 304.9-430. This section shall not apply to transactions between an authorized insurer and persons providing adjusting services pursuant to KRS 304.9-430 (9), (10), and (12).

An authorized insurer shall not do business in Kentucky with an administrator who is not licensed in accordance with KRS 304.9-052. This subsection shall not apply to transactions between an authorized insurer and persons providing administrator services pursuant to KRS 304.9-051.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 15, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 16, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 6, effective April 1, 1985.
